title: Happy Birthday Chhaya Soni!
content: Happy Birthday, Chhaya Soni! Wishing you a day filled with joy, laughter, and love.
image_desc: - A colorful birthday cake with candles lit, surrounded by balloons.
narration: Happy Birthday, Chhaya Soni! Wishing you a day filled with joy, laughter, and love.

title: Celebrating Chhaya
content: - Chhaya you are a wonderful friend, always there to lend a listening ear and offer support.,- Your kindness and generosity are truly inspiring.,- I am so lucky to have you in my life.
image_desc: - A photo of Chhaya Soni smiling and laughing with friends.
narration:
Chhaya i a truly special person. She's always there to lend a listening ear and offer support. Her kindness and generosity are truly inspiring. We are so lucky to have her in our lives.

-

title: Wishing You the Best
content: - May your birthday be filled with happiness and joy.
- May all your wishes come true.
- We hope you have a wonderful year ahead.
image_desc: - A birthday card with a colorful design and the words "Happy Birthday" written on it.
narration: I wish you a birthday filled with happiness and joy. May all your wishes come true, and may you have a wonderful year ahead.
